_header: As in you resteth my Joy and comfort
_description: To his mistress — two stanzas rhyme royal.

CULFf16.First Lines:
As in yow resstyth my Ioy and comfortyoure dissese ys my mortal
                    payneSone god send me seche reporteþat may comfort myn hert in
                    euery vayne…
CULFf16.Last Lines:
…Of yowre dyssese to haue allygaunceAnd to be releuyd of all
                    yowre grevaunce
